bug.author: kooock
bug.description:
Thank you for submitting a TensorFlow documentation issue. Per our GitHub policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests, and build/installation issues on GitHub. The TensorFlow docs are open source! To get involved, read the documentation contributor guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs>https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/dtypes/cast>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/dtypes/cast</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Usage example</denchmark-h>
Is there a usage example? the example: x = tf.constant([1.8, 2.2], dtype=tf.float32) tf.cast(x, tf.int32) # [1, 2], dtype=tf.int32 is not correct. It need to change tf.cast to tf.dtypes.cast. this is correct example x = tf.constant([1.8, 2.2], dtype=tf.float32) tf.dtypes.cast(x, tf.int32) # [1, 2], dtype=tf.int32 <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/29214>#29214</denchmark-link>
Are you planning to also submit a pull request to fix the issue? See the docs contributor guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs>https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs</denchmark-link> and the docs style guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs_style>https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs_style</denchmark-link>
